website_summaries.verdict: A basic, budget-conscious choice if you don't need all the bells and whistles.
pros: Durable, mild steel construction that is lightweight but lasts a long time
Comes in a four- or six-cube basic starter pack
Each cube measures 14 inches by 14 inches
cons: This is a low-cost option, so the quality isn't as high as other options

customer_reviews.title: Cheap alternative to a drying rack
customer_reviews.text: As an art teacher, this works perfectly as a drying rack! Store-bought racks can range between $300+, so this was a great alternative. I bought 2 sets, building the first like normal and using the second set as individual shelves and zip-tying them to the bars of the outer cube. Overall, very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pigs love them!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use them for the intended purpose but they are very sturdy and i was able to change up the way i set the cage up very easily. These can help you make a big comfortable cage for your pets. I had a two story and the top was sturdy and held up great with my little fat guinea pigs running around. I ended up making it longer and have plenty left over to make a top. As you can see we were able to bend some to make a tunnel and the girls love running around and going under it. I'm planning on ordering more to make a stand for it and add some width and length!
customer_reviews.author: CLUF

customer_reviews.title: Great storage and organizer
customer_reviews.text: My ceilings are pretty high, which means that the space above the already-installed closet shelf is largely wasted. We purchased one of these 6-cube units to organize that space. It went together pretty easily land seemed very sturdy and solid. Following advice from another reviewer, we put zip ties at the corners and also used them to anchor the cubes to the installed wire shelf -- so it is very sturdy and stable. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Indiana reader

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as a display stand, not to put together as cubes, and wasn’t sure how sturdy it would be when building straight up. It actually works great and if you experiment a little with right angles and how much support it requires, you can build up surprisingly high.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Kuras

customer_reviews.title: I like these products but will not buy this brand
customer_reviews.text: Ok considering the price and the fact it was delivered to my door. However, I grew up with these things and have used many different brands of these wire cube things. The quality of the Amazon basics is very low. The squares of wire are a bit too small. I knew exactly how to assemble, but had loads of trouble getting the cube to connect and stay because they would pop out. I would not buy again. I like these products but will not buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes great pet cage
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Inexpensive but good quality. Use them as part of my guinea pig cage.
customer_reviews.author: EckoKitten

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong for the price
customer_reviews.text: If I had paid more, it would be 2-3 stars. For this price I really like it and it will serve it's purpose (holding my crap). It is a little flimsy and the connectors don't seem too secure I will not be putting more than ~5 lbs on any of the shelves, so it should hold. I may add some zip ties for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in how flimsy this is!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this is so bad!! I’m really disappointed with this purchase. First off, assembly wasn’t too hard, but upon moving it into place it kept comin apart. It’s just so cheaply made it wouldn’t stay in the plastic holding clips. Then, the gauge of the wire frame is so flimsy that with normal use the wires actually bent. This isn’t like the one I had in college 20 years ago that could hold a ton on books, jeans, etc with no problem. It’s for featherweight stuff and should not be moved at all.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Stahmann

customer_reviews.title: Not enough panels to stack vertically
customer_reviews.text: The 4 cube set 9 (contrary to what the listing claims) does not have enough panels to stack them vertically. It is one panel short so you end up with an open front and an open top on the upper cube. The listing said they could be assembled " tall & skinny" It doesn't say there won't be a top. I should have figured out how many panels I would need before I assembled (and safety wired each connector along the way) them or it would be on the way back. I absolutely detest these misleading listings.
customer_reviews.author: willban1

customer_reviews.title: Missing connectors
customer_reviews.text: THE REASON OF ONE STAR REVIEW : I have purchased 2 boxes of 4 cube wire storage shelves. According to your product description I supposed to receive 40 connectors where as I only have received 20 connectors. Because of this I could not set up all cubes and I have wires do not know what to do with them. Am I suppose to return all of them or one box or you can send me missing connectors ??????
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Missing Parts!
customer_reviews.text: I assembled three units, placed them in the corner of my room and filled them with items, and they look great. Unfortunately, when I proceeded to assemble the last three units, I completed two cubes and discovered that three out of four wires were missing on the last cube. Two black fasteners were also missing -- very frustrating. I am not going to return the cubes because I went through the trouble of assembling 5 out of 6, and I already stored items in the first three shelves. I am very disappointed. Lesson learned...always take inventory before building an item!
customer_reviews.author: Haydeeayala

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I had bought one of these cubes for $30 and when I saw the price on this one I was sold. Well Iam using this to expand my guinea pig cage. It was a pain because the knobs that’s are used to secure the grids are so big they just slide off. Some of the grids are larger than others. I can’t return it because now Iam confused of which ones are mines and which ones belong to this rack. I have secured with zip ties but my cage is falling apart. Iam very annoyed. It’s the price you pay. Also some of the pain was coming off just by me picking them up. It’s cheap
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Several missing connectors
customer_reviews.text: There were several missing black connectors for this product. That’s the only bad thing about online purchasing like these you can’t just drive to the store and fix the issue it takes a whole process! I ordered two sets and was only able to assembly one of them so yes I was disappointed. I have a lot of the basket parts for the actual basket but they’re just taking up space rather than help organize things because I can’t put it together without the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Used for Parrots
customer_reviews.text: These are great because they are not vinyl coated, like the ones I got elsewhere. They are actually painted. (The birds chew off the vinyl coating!!) I hung these on the wall to make climbing areas for the bird, and to keep the floor clear below for easier cleaning. They worked great. I don't use the connectors, though, because they tend to come lose eventually when moving the unit too often. Not sure if these will stay put, but I zip tied the squares together instead, since I had them come off in the past (other brands).
customer_reviews.author: Janice Gochnauer

customer_reviews.title: I like these, but to me the assembly directions (or ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these, but to me the assembly directions (or maybe just the drawings) could have been a lot easier to understand. After several frustrating attempts, I finally got these cubes together. But, since the price is right, I'm not going to complain too much. I just want to see if they're going to STAY together. Not quite sure if they'll be sturdy enough for my heavier items, so I'm just putting art supplies in them for now. I'd probably order from this company again, because they arrived on time and were packaged very securely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product, be wary of bridge connectors
customer_reviews.text: great cheap product. 4 stars cause it was a pain to put together. after you get a few in, when you snap in another bridge something will fall out of place. if you're not careful it can easily all come loose. after i got it all set and it's filled with items it's solid.
customer_reviews.author: CupOfRamen

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is horrific!
customer_reviews.text: This was horrible! I bought this to use as a closet organizer for my son's closet. It is absolutely impossible to put together and comes with no mallet to assist in the building process like some others do. None of the pieces sould stay linked together during set up so needless to say I returned it. Disappointing to say the least. I will be purchasing a sturdier option for sure that doesn't require brute strength to put together
customer_reviews.author: Alicia V

customer_reviews.title: Use a hammer
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are almost useless and don’t mention that all the clips should have the same orientation and direction. Nor do they mention that the final step needs to be to tap each clip into place with a hammer to avoid them popping out when you put stuff in them. Fortunately, the structure is simple and almost intuitive. Four stars because they do hold a lot and can be expanded with additional kits.
customer_reviews.author: Autsilk

customer_reviews.title: Great Size for Price
customer_reviews.text: I loved how big the cubes were, I was able to easily construct it to house some toys and give some items a home in my daughter's room. My only complaint is that the spacers or small circles to connect the cube are a little difficult to secure - they slip out and I happened to have a rubber mallet at home to get them in there securely. I would definitely recommend using a mallet to get all the lines straight and flush into the spacers. You can't beat this price for how clean it looks and how much you can store in them. I love that you can choose the design and can style them however you like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A history of building Tinker Toys is helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold the 6 cubes for storage. I did not require it to hold anything heavy in the cube, but if you increase weight, some zip ties on the corners would probably be necessary. The instructions are lacking, just pictures, and the nature of the product in the drawings makes it difficult to really see what to do. Fortunately, I was a child in the 1950s and 1960’s, so falling back on my early Tinker Toy skills helped a lot with the assembly. For this reason, I give it 4 stars, not 5. If Tinker Toys were not in your childhood, it might be more challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, nice cheaper option than wood
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to put it together, my three year old figured it out pretty quick. It does require a little finesse, to get the corner pieces on just right - but it works really well. Was able to store a large amount of bathroom supplies. It weighs almost nothing, so it can tip over. I would recommend putting something heavy-ish on the bottom shelf or use an anti-tip device to keep it from falling over if you have kids that like to climb.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: No connectors included :(
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but didn't come with the connectors as pictured... used zip ties. If connectors were included, would have given a 5-star rating. Had to use them the day I received them.
customer_reviews.author: ANA M. GONZALES

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay assembled
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for 5 months now and finally had to throw it in the trash because it would not stay assembled. Maybe adults who are gentle with things could keep this thing together, but my husband and I both were constantly putting it back together as it came apart daily. I could not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jkl;

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I have a very specific place that I wanted to find some kind of storage rack for and was thrilled when I found this item that was JUST the right height. Unfortunately, the dimensions in the listing don't seem to take into account the plastic connector pieces that stick out beyond the edges of the wire frames. That small difference prevents me from using these where I had planned. I am keeping the set I bought because I can use it somewhere else, but this was a disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Minke

customer_reviews.title: Great for Guinea Pig Enclosures!
customer_reviews.text: Great product ! Bought two 6 cube sets and built a hug guinea pig enclosure for my two babies. Just be weary as the holes are too big to work as an effective cage for a newborn guinea pig or any hamster-sized pet. I just added some chloroplast on the edges and pond liner for the bottom and added the bedding on top of that and it allowed or a very spacious and durable enclosure. I do recommend using zip ties to connect the pieces instead of the round pieces they come with. The round pieces will definitely hold it together but if you plan on moving the cage at all, it will fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was a bit confusing. But with years under my belt of putting IKEA products together, I figured out the pics...with the help of my magnifying glass. LOL. I did have the pieces going on to the crates wrong, I had to take a double look, figured it out, and it was easy peasy from there on. I purchased it to hold my linens and towels & it looks great!!!! I already want more for different uses, clothes, shoes, grand kids' toys, etc. I like the sturdiness of it also. I'm glad I got it! I'll take a pic of it later with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: gmom14

customer_reviews.title: Do not mix and match this brand with other similar brands!
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up, I purchased a very similar product from a different brand and the Amazon Basics circular attachments that keep the pieces together are not all the same size, so trying to combine the two to extend your shelf or cat patio could result in injury or property damage. That does not detract from the product, simply sharing my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Alligator Jones

customer_reviews.title: Has sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this cube storage but all the pieces have a very sharp side, and even with trying to face all those sharp sides outward, some have to sit forward and then my soft storage bins get snagged along with my fingers. Also you can only assemble them together as 6 cubes rather than having the option to split them in half because it only comes with a certain number of connectors. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: ThreatLevelMidnight

customer_reviews.title: Good storage for class library.
customer_reviews.text: I used these cubes to build a storage area for my class library. I built a row with seven cubes horizontally (I used some pieces that I already had) they fit perfectly into the old set and is holding the weight of two baskets with books on the top and one large basket inside the cube. The metal had no scratches that I could see on the metal. I can't wait to see how they hold up with my first graders.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Iglesias

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoe storage!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to put in my entry closet to store shoes and other odds and ends we tend to throw in there when we get home. This was the perfect choice! Each cube holds about six pairs of sneaker-sized shoes, and 10 or more pairs of flats/sandals. For the price I was worried it wouldn't be sturdy, but it stands up on its own just fine. Assembly is easy - it took me and my partner about 10 minutes to put together. All in all, I'm super happy with this purchase! Planning to buy one of the smaller sets to organize sweaters on my closet shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Holly West

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for yarn and fabrics!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are “tricky” to assemble, and you will need a small rubber mallet. But, I’ve assembled this type before, so I knew what to expect. These make great craft storage! I condensed my yarn and fabric into these units. The heavy stuff (serger, embroidery machine, Criquet cutter) are all stored on the floor level, as these shelves will NOT support more than about 13 pounds comfortably... and I’m not willing to chance it. And, as you can see from photo, I need to order a few more to complete the tops...
customer_reviews.author: samantha jones

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I am using in my walk in closet on top of white wire shelving/rod. I have really high ceilings, and needed the space to store my handbags. Honestly, it gives the walk in a boutique feel. Very sturdy; I had zip ties ready to use but only used them to attach the unit to my shelf. My only tiny complaint is that the white of the grid is a little off white, and the corner pieces are even darker, almost almond in color. But for the price, I really should not complain. I mention it only if you are contemplating purchase and are extremely sensitive about that kind of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful until you put stuff on it. Our items are under the weight limit and I honestly would say at least once a month these shelves come unhinged and topple over, spilling everything in them and then we are back to square one with putting it all back together again. The buttons you use to connect the shelves are not very good and the metal comes out very easily. They look great when they are up but man oh man these things are frustrating. I would suggest not getting these for anything heavy or valuable. If you’re just storing light weight objects it would probably be fine. Just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad - Mostly Good
customer_reviews.text: These shelves were fairly easy to assemble and can hold fairly large capacity of clothing. The metal is thick and doesn't bend. They are great for compact spaces with a variety of uses! The cons: The locks can be knocked out of place fairly easily causing that shelf to colapse and clothing to fall forward; however, if one breaks it still stays intact. It's a matter of finding the lost piece in the kids bedroom that is the challenge. #MysteryGames
customer_reviews.author: Thatsthegoodstuff

customer_reviews.title: Storage for your items.
customer_reviews.text: Fast assembly, easy to do once you get a handle on it. What did I use it for. Shoes. My Mrs. has many pairs of shoes. I put 2 of these units together. Solved a problem of where to go with all of them. We have a large laundry room on the 2nd floor, this fit perfectly on one wall. 4 pair will fit in a slot. One tip you may want to zip tie the ends of the racks together for a few days till all settles. Black ties you never see them.
customer_reviews.author: PC Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and classic
customer_reviews.text: I love this style of shelf/rack. It’s easy to put together, and is very versatile. There are a lot of configurations you can make with it, but the standard 3x2 is the most common. We needed a little more organization and storage space in the bedroom. Stuff was piled on stuff, and my wife couldn’t easily find anything. Enter this rack. Now things are a lot more neat and easy to find. She doesn’t have towels on top of clothes on top of covers on top of shoes. It certainly cleaned up this corner of our room quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: willisotaTop Contributor: Firefly (TV Show)

customer_reviews.title: Great for our kitchen needs, but missing one square
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute for our kitchen... for the little things that take up counter space. This has freed up our counter and makes our kitchen look cute and simple again. It was easy and fun to put together; the pieces just 'snap' on to each other. It's not rocket science. The reason for my 4 star instead of 5 star rating is that our package was missing one piece of one of the cubes. After unpacking it and putting it together, I didn't want to ship it back, so I kept it. My recommendation is to count all the squares BEFORE putting it together. Other than that, it is a great buy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Saved by Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great guinea pig/rabbit cage.
customer_reviews.text: This, zip ties and coroplast work out so much cheaper and roomier than a pet store pet cage. Docked one star for durability bc a couple grids contact weld didn’t hold but it’s not terrible quality. Bought two boxes. Happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to be similar to ones I had years ago, but they are not. I recommend only using these in a single cube tower, since it tend to fall apart if it's wider. The wire squares are not the right size for the connectors, as the whole thing doesn't fit together snugly. Also, the ones I bought were missing a square.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Display 5/5
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Comes with hardware for assembly. -Perfect for display and storage. -Comes in multiple sizes. -Not too expensive. Cons: -Can be unstable if lighter objects are on display. -Can be unstable altogether as a unit. Final thoughts: -My second time buying this type of product. My first time I bought from a different seller, which I wish I didn’t do because that seller’s product is cheaper and less sturdy than the one I’m reviewing now. I managed to make them work by using zipties to fasten them altogether. Which I recommend everyone to do to make the unit more stable anyway! -I recommend this product. -Check photos for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Not durabl
customer_reviews.text: I used zip ties on the entire unit and now, after a year, that is what holds the shelves together. The connectors came off so many times, I stopped putting them back on and now, only a few remain.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger H-L

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I typically don't write reviews, but I base my purchases off reviews so I figured it's time to give back! I just bought an older home and storage is limited. We have a smaller walk-in closet that the previous owners didn't configure to it's maximal storage capacity. I have a lot of sweaters and sweatshirts and had to think of an alternative with the limited room and strange space. These cubes have been a LIFE saver and I can still fit more. They were slightly difficult to click together but my grip strength is pretty weak so my boyfriend helped me out. There were plenty of connectors, make sure your assembling properly. Pretty sturdy and bigger than typical cube storage!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy build, hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It does not come with instructions to assemble. I made the mistake of assembling it in an ad-hoc manner and that was a mistake and I had to redo it all. My recommendation is to build it bottom-up, and have a friend to help!
customer_reviews.author: Aneesh MG

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make a guinea pig c&c cage. I suggest buying two to make it big enough and to have enough connectors. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany sanders

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. First one was great (it was bigger and was in black) and was easy to assemble. This one gave me cancer. Very poorly made or I just received the defected one, I don’t know. Impossible to stay still. Connectors and grids seem like made uneven so it keeps coming off. Don’t know what to do with these. I’ve already spent hours trying to try many different combinations but no. Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Lr

customer_reviews.title: very very unstable
customer_reviews.text: The slightest bump in the wrong direction will topple these shelves and spill everything on them. And they always ship you waaaayyy more sheets than clips. It's like the 12-hotdog and 8-bun packs marketing gimmick. Foul.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. It seemed so awkward to put together. Assembly for this could have been simplied with less pieces in my opinion. I was disappointed that I couldn't separate the cubes. They have to be attached together, there isn't enough pieces to have them separate. I wanted two on either side of my gym area in the basement. But they seem sturdy enough and serve the purpose for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: ShannyCamp

customer_reviews.title: Where are the connectors?
customer_reviews.text: I received a box filled with only frames and nothing to connect them with, so I'm having to buy connectors from a different seller, despite the ad claiming it'd come with connectors. Talk about false advertising! The frames are well made and clearly very durable, but make sure you purchase your own connectors since apparently this one only shows connectors in the models but not in the product you actually receive.
customer_reviews.author: spot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed it for
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't purchased to be used as cubes. We bought this in order to cover some windows so the cat can't knock out or rip the screens and get out while still letting air through. We used zip ties to create one custome sized cover and attached using binder clips. The pieces are sturdy and free from defects so I think they would work well as storage cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to assemble, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shelf for my son's cloths. It is very easy to assemble the shelf, it took me about 15 minutes or so. the one I bought is white, it looks quite nice. It makes me so happy now that my son's clothings are not all messed together. I liked it so much that I bought one for myself to keep my t-shirts, underwears and socks. Best for keeping light weight things like clothing, socks, underwear, or small blankets.
customer_reviews.author: C You

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay assembled, constantly falling apart
customer_reviews.text: If you've never felt a penchant for homicide, this rack will change that. It is constantly popping apart. The metal squares aren't all even sizes so they don't fit in the connectors well. So much as bumping it will make it fall apart. Don't cheap out and get something nicer if you plan to use it for storage
customer_reviews.author: NL Persico

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheaply made, warped, and difficult to assemble. It’s only difficult because the pieces are so I’ll fitting that it pops itself apart. Do not waste your money on this product. It’s so bad in fact that it may be the cause of the Apocalypse.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kathman

customer_reviews.title: great device!
customer_reviews.text: These are compatible with the other wire storage cubes that I have had for over ten years, which is great! They are incredibly versatile - however the plastic corners can be brittle. I have found that the easiest way to take them back apart with minimal damage (to my fingers and to the item) is to use a light hammer and gently tap in the direction you want the pieces to go. Additionally, you can use zipties if the plastic corners break or if you expand your use creatively like I do and do not have enough corner pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Buy Zip Ties, don’t use connectors
customer_reviews.text: I used these to organize my closet by making double the shelf space going to the ceiling. They are kind of flimsy if you use their connectors. I did not use their connectors. I opted to buy zip ties and now this unit is very sturdy. My closet holds more clothing and shoes. I am very happy. Planning to buy a set for each bedroom closet and some for basement closets too.
customer_reviews.author: Gobomel

customer_reviews.title: Basic storage
customer_reviews.text: It came as described. I ordered this twice now and they seem to hold up a lot of weight. The structure jiggles if you accidentally kick it but it will only give you a scare and won't fall apart. I am using it to hold plants in front of our balcony door and I have almost 10 of which one of them is a huge peace lily. I recommend these. The only improvement that they could do is add in more of those clamps.
customer_reviews.author: bhat01

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions
customer_reviews.text: This product did not come with an instruction guide. Luckily I was able to use photos from reviews and wing it. It was a pain to put together. When you tighten one piece, another piece would come undone. I followed a past review and used zip ties to keep it all together. The clamps that hold it in place take up storage space on the bottom, back and sides of cubes. That’s why I’m one review there’s a photo of the cubes on top of a wood plank to compensate for the space on the bottom. There is one section that the clamps are undone but it still holds position. Overall, it got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bourbakis

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space
customer_reviews.text: Holds everything I need it to, plus room for more. I’m a 61 year old woman and had no problem putting it together. I have arthritis in my hands and still did not need any tools for assembly. The manufacturer says 10 lbs per cube weight limit (60 lbs total) and that’s probably about right. I’m really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CAlderman

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a quick shelf set for my foods and this works perfectly! Set up was easy and self explanatory. My only concern was that they do come out easy, but it may be because I didn't push them in fully. Even then, it holds strong and as long as you don't exceed the weight by a single ounce, it works great! Cheap, quick set up, sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Aiyona Anderson

customer_reviews.title: together in 15 min, perfect for my crafts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my craft room, as I needed cubes for my yarn and other tidbits. I put this together without help. It was slightly tricky making sure the panels were all in the connectors at the same depth/level, but it only took a min or 2 to figure it out. I don't think I'd use it for heavy storage, but certainly good enough for kids room or dorm.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bunny cage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to make a cage for my bunny. It is so easy to assemble and take it down. I can chance the shape and the size anytime. He's been using it for nearly a year and he loves it. All the bunny cages you can buy at pet stores or anywhere else are super small. I am happy that I could make my boy a nice and big cage where he can feel safe.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Makes a Great guinea pig cage
customer_reviews.text: I use these cubes for guinea pig cage. I've tried other cages, this is my favorite. It's more sturdy, it's got more room for my pets & it's easier to clean than others.
customer_reviews.author: Cory and Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my daughters closet to hold her wipes and diapers. Works great! It was a tiny bit hard to assemble believe it or not. But wish the end pieces would come cut in half I know they stay round Incase you want to add more but I couldn’t finished the right end wall bc the clips were too big.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent deneen

customer_reviews.title: Challenging Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Nice price. Apparently a nice design. However, the assembly is very challenging as the black connector pieces are stiff plastic and have no flexibility. Thus, as I added panels and tried to pop them into the connector pieces, other connector pieces popped out and flew across the room. One connector piece broke. I tried using Velcro cable ties for stability but that didn't work. Overall a poorly designed product. Do NOT buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit Lady

customer_reviews.title: Would not repurchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been using his products since January and I hate it! It is not very sturdy and is constantly collapsing . I bought this on a sale and I am glad I didn’t pay full price . It’s junk .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: These are straight up simple and do exactly what they say. We use them in our closet, on the very top shelf, 3 in each one. They work well to hold items inside as well as being able to stack things on top to take advantage of the space at the top of closets. All in all, works great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Super durable! Perfect building matierial to finish my bunny’s cage
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I used them (along with a puppy play pen and some puzzle mats)to make my bunny’s cage and roof to his cage. They are very durable and I was also able to bend one of them using vice grips to make a ramp for his second story. He no longer can escape his “condo.” Very happy with this purchase, will purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a C&C cage build
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to make a C&C cage for my daughter's guinea pigs. We used two sets and built a nice off-the-ground large cage with a lid to stop our cats from snuggling with them. We used zip ties to secure everything once we were done assembling. The piggies love their large cage!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon and MelisaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Catio!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make a small cat enclosure or “catio” for my two cats! It worked great! I positioned it near a swing window and they can go in and out at their leisure without the danger of getting hurt. It’s very heavy, so they can’t push it away from the building, but you could easily affix it to a flat surface. I added zip ties to each junction for extra support if they decide to climb. This a cheap and easy way to build a cat enclosure!!
customer_reviews.author: Annaphylaxsis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I stacked mine four high for kids room closet storage. There are so many different ways this can be put together, so I know that if I don't need it any more for this use, I'll just put it together in another arrangement for another use. It's way sturdier than I thought it would be. Super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I used some zip ties with these to create storage for my 12x12 scrapbook paper. It works perfect. I had been looking for something affordable to store my paper and I finally found something. It’s sturdy and holds a lot of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Shop4deals

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective
customer_reviews.text: I have own this product before, and I have used the wire panels for a number of projects. This time we made a guinea pig cage. I don't think they are sturdy enough for heavy storage, but a cost effective answer to storage issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great closet organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Great closet organizer. Loved it so much I bought a second. I would have given it a 5 star review all the way across the board, except for staying together. That lost a star. But never fail I used small black zip ties. Nothing is taking this thing down now. Loving it.
customer_reviews.author: M Gianakos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my closet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an inexpensive shelf in my closet to put spare towels and throws upon and shoes underneath. Easy to assemble. Worked perfect. Looks like it will last. One odd thing. I used three squares on the bottom row and one square on the second row. It comes with 16 identical pieces that serve as sides, tops, and bottoms. That means the box on the second row is short a top. NBD for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fox

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, perfect for college dorms
customer_reviews.text: It's been about a week using this and I can already tell it's very sturdy and will last all four years of college. I got this to make storage under my bed and it not only looks great but holds nearly all my stuff I need to store. I can always add more cubes if I need, but which is great. Plenty of room to store things, and fits nice under the bed. Very easy to assemble, it's straightforward and simple.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Quick & Easy Assembly. Stable.
customer_reviews.text: I have this shelf for inside our entry way closet. Easy to put together. Stable and can hold a considerable amount of weight. Great product. I put little felt movers on the bottoms of the black corner pieces to help it slide around a little easier when cleaning around it.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaLMK

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing your closet.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that you could configure them as you wish. The cubes are larger than I anticipated, so I returned the four-pack because the six-pack was sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Kiko

customer_reviews.title: Great for military families!
customer_reviews.text: We are a military family so we’re always moving. These are perfect for customizing to whichever size closet my kids rooms have in the many houses we live in. Lol! It is also easy to store and pack and don’t take a lot of weight. And I don’t have to worry about movers damaging them!
customer_reviews.author: Maile

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were not very well written so it took a little while to figure out how to stack them. I have attached a photo to show how this works. Once I figured it out, it was easy. The cubes are very sturdy and hold a lot of items – as you can see by the other photo.
customer_reviews.author: BestLifePublications

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, a little confusing to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Please take the time to read and figure out how to assemble storage. It was pretty confusing at first, but once we got it together, it came out surprisingly sturdy and incredibly convenient for our closet. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Mikeyla

customer_reviews.title: Expanded my Guinea pigs cage
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make a second story to my guinea pigs home. Came quickly. Most of the grids were perfect, I think 1 or 2 had a couple bars that were no welded on completely, but it did not cause any problems for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lalena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, solid fittings, spacious - definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.text: These shelves were super easy to put together it might have taken me 15 minutes, all told, going very very slowly. Could easily be put together in 10 min. The shelves can be assembled in a number of configurations, depending on your requirements. I’d definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: TomHunter1968

customer_reviews.title: I need something extra to hold the mounds of t-shirts I have and it works great. I worried that with too much weight it ...
customer_reviews.text: After a few cuss words and wrong turns, these shelves were decently simple to put together. It kind of reminds me of something you could buy at IKEA, but cheaper. I need something extra to hold the mounds of t-shirts I have and it works great. I worried that with too much weight it might bend and break, but it seems sturdy enough. It's not something that would last for a lifetime, but it works for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for organization
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, it’s pretty awesome for storage and organizing. I use it for my clothes like jeans, leggings, & sweatpants and shoes. It made it so much easier to organize my clothing in my closet and it’s appearance isn’t as bad I thought it would be. I love it and definitely getting more
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Can easily scratch their fingers
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to build a cubic unit for grandchildren to storage their books, lego sets and trains. But the wire finished is too rough for the kids. Can easily scratch their fingers. For adults, it might be fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pig cage
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these to make a guinea pig cage. So all of the parts that connect the grids weren’t needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra_67

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike how easy it seemed to be to assemble which turned out to be difficult.. it seemed to be to make a good storage space for shoes and small storage but when I attempted to move the cubes to a different space it fell completely apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley brohas

customer_reviews.title: 13x13x13 cubes fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's closet and liked it so much I immediately ordered 2 sets for the other closets. Be sure when ordering cubes to get 13x13x13. I made the mistake of ordering the "frequently bought together" package without any due diligence. They did not fit. I felt pretty silly, but now the cat has a nice place to hide in every room.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic shelf
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a plant stand and it looks great. Assembly was easy for me and I'm satisfied with the amount of space I have and the possibility of expanding it if need be. It seems slightly wobbly but realistically, there isn't much weight to it so im ok with that, plus I won't be moving it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Samira Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Doubled storage space in closet
customer_reviews.text: Used it above the clothing bar in my closet was just a shelf but these fit great above (I have very tall ceilings) now I can put much more up there in an organized fashion instead of things being piled on top of each other! Tip use small clear zip ties to keep it together also check each grate and place them with the raised side facing up easier to slide things in and out. You’ll see what I mean when you order them!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought this to build a guinea pig cage. Works great, for outside we also bought tent stakes to keep them from being able to get out. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on my shelf in my closet; bought two units and used it to made it a 5x2 unit. I know longer need a dresser to take up space, I've got it in my closet.Probably going to use the rest of the units to store magazines/books/etc. Instructions could have been better, but once you start putting it together, you pretty much figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Truck bed organization!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a use case for groceries and loose items in the truck bed, this product looks like the perfect fit and affordable. I'll probably run a cable thru it all, add some zip ties for reinforcement eventually, toying with idea of fashioning a pivot and latch for the top three pieces left over, as a lid. May have to buy more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Scott T

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These grids are perfect.. I bought these after watching Scotty’s animals video on you tube as to how to make my own guinea pig cage. These are the best .. now I know I’m now using them as shelves however that just proves how study these are !!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Came without connectors-- twice
customer_reviews.text: First box came without the connectors, immediately returned it using the "missing/damaged parts" selection from the drop-down menu, promptly received a replacement that was also... missing the connectors. Looks like I'll have to try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: 345dance

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Don’t rely on it. It can only hold very light things and it comes apart easily if you brush against it. I was using it in my classroom as a temporary place to put materials for a project, but the thing kept coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amelie Krikorian

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Assembled by myself in less than 15 minutes. No tools required. A bit smaller than I was expecting, but that's my fault for not paying attention to the dimensions. Don't feel it is worth $30, but it does suit my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Loving my life

customer_reviews.title: No zip ties needed
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why everyone thinks you need zip ties??? Maybe they are putting an anvil on it?? I have my TV on it for right now and it’s perfectly stable with out the zip ties. I think that if you need zip ties something isn’t set up right. So save yourself the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Sherer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for the 3 Sprouts organizing containers! Works great in my daughters closet.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Love

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I hated this shelf. It falls apart anytime you put anything that has any weight at all on it. I replaced it with a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! sturdy, versatile. However, mine was missing parts, Submitted a request to have parts replaced but they wanted the whole thing returned. Pretty irritating. I made the product work without the missing parts
customer_reviews.author: W. Ross

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics 4 Cube Grid Wire Storage Shelves, White
feature_bullets: 4-pack of interlocking wire storage cubes for neat storage and tidy display (each cube measure 14x14x14)
Includes 20 plastic corner connectors and 16 grid panels made of powder-coated steel wire; no tools required for set-up
Modular design allows for multiple stacking options; 10-pound weight capacity per cube; 40-pound weight capacity total
Set weighs 11.28 pounds; solid white color for easy coordinating with surrounding décor
Backed by an AmazonBasics limited one-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars6,301 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
